Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HTLV-1 envelope glycoprotein (gp21))
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19114713]:Human T cell leukemia virus type 1(HTLV-1):inhibition of mambrane fusion in 293T cells(IC50=0.18 ± 0.01 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide is an effective inhibitor of HTLV-1 envelope-catalyzed membrane fusion and thus inhibits virus entry.

Literature.Title: Basic residues are critical to the activity of peptide inhibitors of human T cell leukemia virus type 1 entry.
Literature.Author: Lamb D, Mirsaliotis A, Kelly SM, Brighty DW.
